title: Bus owners warn of possible price hike
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Lanka Private Bus Owners’ Association informed that there is a risk of the minimum bus fare being increased to Rs.40/- due to the current crisis in the country.
Chairperson of the Lanka Private Bus Owners’ Association further said that replacing Ministers NOT going to solve the crises in the country.
Sri Lanka on Monday (18) appointed a new Cabinet of Minister, following the mass resignation of the previous cabinet and around 41 ruling faction MPs deciding to remain independent in Parliament.
